dcterms:creator: S. Nah
T. Hyun Kim
K. Mu Lee
dcterms:description: The GoPro dataset is formed from 240 frames-per-second video sequences acquired by a GoPro Hero 4 camera. The blurred images are generated by averaging consecutive short-exposure frames.
dcterms:title: GoPro Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Köhler
M. Hirsch
B. Mohler
B. Schölkopf
S. Harmeling
dcterms:description: Kohler's dataset consists of images that represent camera motion blurring. It was created by recording real camera motion from videos that captured the 6-degrees-of-freedom motion trajectory during imaging.
dcterms:title: Kohler’s Dataset

dcterms:creator: W.-S. Lai
J.-B. Huang
Z. Hu
N. Ahuja
M.-H. Yang
dcterms:description: Lai's dataset emphasizes real-world blurring and consists of three parts: a uniform-blur part, a nonuniform-blur part, and a real-world blur part, with the real-world part containing 100 real blurred images published in previous deblurring works.
dcterms:title: Lai’s Dataset
